description:
crypto/tls: make the package description more accurate and less aspirational.

Fixes issue 3216.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Tue, Mar 6, 2012 at 8:31 AM, <agl@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> crypto/tls: make the package description more accurate and less
> aspirational.
>
> Fixes issue 3216.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5755056/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5755056/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/crypto/tls/tls.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/crypto/tls/tls.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/crypto/tls/tls.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/crypto/tls/tls.go
> @@ -2,8 +2,7 @@
>  // Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style
>  // license that can be found in the LICENSE file.
>
> -// Package tls partially implements the TLS 1.1 protocol, as specified in
> RFC
> -// 4346.
> +// Package tls partially implements TLS 1.0, as specified in RFC 2246.
>  package tls
>
>  import (
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=677b60c6d1e7 ***

crypto/tls: make the package description more accurate and less aspirational.

Fixes issue 3216.

subject: code review 5755056: crypto/tls: make the package description more accurate ...
